name: Cannon Climber
description:
This is a rage game where you shoot your way to victory!

In this game you have to shoot Timmy (The orange guy), around 25 levels.

You are able to get 3 stars:

1 star: complete all of the levels.

2 stars: complete all of the levels with a time limit.

3 stars: complete all the levels with 1 life.
